entry.description: 查询临时表待处理数据
entry.value: select * from tab_temp_b b where b.groupId = 0 AND (b.operationType = 0 OR b.operationType = 1) ORDER BY b.Time ASC

entry.description: 查询卸船机作业数据任务ID、船舱ID
entry.value: SELECT cabin.id, t.task_id AS 'taskId' FROM tab_cabin cabin LEFT JOIN ( SELECT c.*, task.`offset`, task.`status`, task.begin_time, CASE WHEN task.end_time IS NULL THEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP () ELSE task.end_time END AS 'end_time' FROM tab_cargo c LEFT JOIN tab_task task ON c.task_id = task.id ) t ON cabin.cargo_id = t.id WHERE t.`status` = 1 AND cabin.start_position <= ? AND cabin.end_position >= ? AND t.begin_time <= ? AND t.end_time >= ?

entry.description: 【任务子表】将临时表作业数据插入子表
entry.value: INSERT INTO tab_temp_b_%s (id, Time, Cmsid, PushTime, OneTask, direction, unloaderMove, operationType, offset, groupId) SELECT id, Time, Cmsid, PushTime, OneTask, direction, unloaderMove, operationType, offset, ? from tab_temp_b where id = ? and cmsid = ?
delete from tab_temp_b where id = ? and cmsid = ?

entry.description: 【任务子表】查询组信息，根据舱ID、 卸船机ID
entry.value: select * from tab_temp_c_%s t where t.`status` = 0 and t.cabinId = ? AND t.Cmsid = ?

entry.description: 【任务子表】创建组信息，根据位移数据
entry.value: insert into tab_temp_c_%s (cabinId, Cmsid, startTime, status) values(?,?,?,?)

entry.description: 【任务子表】创建组信息，根据作业数据
entry.value: insert into tab_temp_c_%s (cabinId, Cmsid, startTime, firstTime, lastTime, status) values(?,?,?,?,?,?)

entry.description: 【任务子表】查询当前卸船机上一组数据
entry.value: select * from tab_temp_c_%s t where t.`status` = 0 AND t.Cmsid = ? AND t.id != ?
UPDATE tab_temp_c_%s t SET t.endTime = ?, t.status = 1 WHERE t.id = ?

entry.description: 【任务子表】更新组结束时间、最后一铲时间
entry.value: UPDATE tab_temp_c_%s t SET t.endTime = ?, t.lastTime = ?, t.status = 1 WHERE t.id = ?

entry.description: 【任务子表】更新组第一铲、最后一铲时间
entry.value: UPDATE tab_temp_c_%s t SET t.firstTime = ?, t.lastTime = ? WHERE t.id = ?

entry.description: 【任务子表】更新组最后一铲时间
entry.value: UPDATE tab_temp_c_%s t SET t.lastTime = ? WHERE t.id = ?

entry.description: 【任务子表】根据任务编号，查询该任务未结束组信息
entry.value: select c2.* from tab_temp_c_%s c2 LEFT JOIN v_cabin_info c1 ON c1.cabin_id = c2.cabinId where c2.`status` = 0 AND c1.task_id = ?

entry.description: 【任务子表】更新组结束时间、状态
entry.value: UPDATE tab_temp_c_%s t SET t.endTime = ?, t.status = ? WHERE t.id = ?
UPDATE tab_temp_b t SET t.status = 1 where id = ? and cmsid = ?

entry.description: 根据卸船机编号，查询临时表待处理数据
entry.value: select * from tab_temp_b b where b.groupId = 0 AND (b.operationType = 0 OR b.operationType = 1) AND b.Cmsid = ? ORDER BY b.Time ASC

entry.description: 查询卸船机数据所属的作业任务
entry.value: SELECT task_id AS taskId, begin_time AS 'beginTime' , CASE WHEN end_time IS NULL THEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() ELSE end_time END AS 'endTime' , CASE WHEN MIN(start_position) - MIN(end_position) < 0 THEN MIN(start_position) WHEN MIN(end_position) - MIN(start_position) < 0 THEN MIN(end_position) END AS 'minPosition' , CASE WHEN MAX(start_position) - MAX(end_position) < 0 THEN MAX(end_position) WHEN MAX(end_position) - MAX(start_position) < 0 THEN MAX(start_position) END AS 'maxPosition' FROM v_cabin_info WHERE `taskStatus` = 1 GROUP BY task_id, begin_time, end_time HAVING minPosition <= ? AND maxPosition >= ? AND beginTime <= ? AND endTime >= ?
select * from tab_temp_c_%s t where t.`status` = 0 AND t.Cmsid = ?
